img_summary: The image displays a game menu focused on the "Equipment" section, specifically highlighting a rare spirit named "Earth Rakshasa." This spirit has a high Qi cost and offers the ability called "Bulwark Shield," which allows the player to take the form of Earth Rakshasa, thrust a heavy shield to smash the ground, damage nearby foes, and block attacks. The equipped effect moderately increases damage reduction for a short duration after being hit. The interface shows various spirits available for selection, each with distinct icons.
